statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT training_date, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT training_topic, training_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Management%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY training_topic;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trainings, AVG(employee_id) AS average_employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY training_topic;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records;
SELECT training_topic, training_date FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM safety_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, training_date, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM safety_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM safety_regulations WHERE LENGTH(regulation_description) > 50;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration BETWEEN 30 AND 90 ORDER BY training_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Presentation%' OR training_topic LIKE '%Communication%' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT training_date, training_topic FROM training_records WHERE pass_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_topic = 'SQL' AND pass_status = TRUE;

SELECT employees.employee_name, training_records.training_topic FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_records.pass_status = FALSE;

SELECT employees.employee_name, compliance_logs.compliance_status FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id JOIN compliance_logs ON training_records.record_id = compliance_logs.record_id WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee;
SELECT session_name, trainer_name, session_date FROM TrainingSession ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';

SELECT employee_name, session_name, completion_date FROM Employee JOIN ComplianceRecord ON Employee.employee_id = ComplianceRecord.employee_id JOIN EmployeeTraining ON ComplianceRecord.training_id = EmployeeTraining.training_id ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT * FROM TrainingSession WHERE session_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(employee_id), AVG(training_id) FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(training_id) > 10
SELECT e.employee_name, c.passed FROM Employee e JOIN ComplianceRecord c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id ORDER BY e.employee_name ASC

SELECT t.session_name, e.employee_name FROM TrainingSession t JOIN EmployeeTraining et ON t.session_id = et.session_id JOIN Employee e ON et.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE t.trainer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_type FROM TrainingProgram ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_date FROM Employee e JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecord etr ON e.employee_id = etr.employee_id WHERE etr.completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM SafetyRegulation WHERE department_id = 1 AND regulation_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM TrainingProgram ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, program_name, training_date FROM EmployeeTrainingRecord WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name, sr.regulation_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_name JOIN SafetyRegulation sr ON d.department_id = sr.department_id;
